text: Kasun Disi Kithuruwan Vithanage is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer who plays for all forms of the game in international level.Kithuruwan Vithanage | Sri Lanka Cricket | Cricket Players and Officials | ESPN Cricinfo He is a Left-hand batsman and legbreak bowler.The Home of CricketArchive ==International centuries== ===Test centuries=== Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries Kithuruwan Vithanage's Test centuries # Runs Match Against City/Country Venue Year Result 1 103* 3 Dhaka, Bangladesh Shere Bangla National Stadium 2014 Won ==References== ==Other websites== * ESPN Cricinfo * Cricket Archive Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers
